text.0: for iṭas sake who pressed the juice thou indra didst protect his car.
text.2: thou from his skin hast borne the head of the swiftmoving combatant.
text.4: venya that mortal man hast thou for Āstrabudhna the devout.
text.5: o indra many a time set free.
text.6: bring indra to the east again that sun who now is in the west.
text.7: even against the will of gods.
